  • All Classes
 

All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AsteroidEvent
    An Asteroid event damages the ship in a GameEnvironment by a random scaled amount to it's shield.
    CommandLineParser
    CommandLineParser acts as an input layer between some input stream and the game.
    CommandLineRunner
    CommandLineRunner controls the main game loop of the Command Line version of the game.
    ConsumableItem
    Item abstract subclass that can be used on a CrewMember a limited number of times.
    CrewEffectChangeObserverEvent
    CrewEffectChangeObserverEvent acts as a container for information regarding CrewMember active effect changes.
    CrewMember
    class containing information about and methods to affect the state of a crew member.
    CrewMemberEffect
    enum to represent the different status effects a crew member can have.
    CrewMemberFactory
    singleton class to create CrewMember subtypes.
    CrewMemberType
    enum to represent the different types of crew members.
    CrewState
    class to handle the state of the game's crew, including their funds, current ship, and inventory.
    CustomCrewListCellRenderer
    custom renderer for CrewMembers to be used in the MainWindow crew list.
    CustomPlanetListCellRenderer
    custom renderer for Planets that shows a star if the planet has a part to be used in the MainWindow planet list if the crew has a scientist.
    Engineer
    the CrewMember subclass Engineer can repair Ship objects more effectively based on a static modifier.
    EventPopupWindow
    popup window for displaying any game event or general message the user may be interested in.
    GameAction
    This enum represents the set of possible actions that can occur a random game event.
    GameEnvironment
    GameEnvironment is the central class to the game having all game related objects as its members.
    GameEvent
    GameEvent is the abstract base class for all random events in the game.
    GameEventManager
    GameEventManager handles the possible GameEvents for every GameAction.
    GameSetup
    GameSetup handles setup of the game.
    GameWorldGenerator
    GameWorldGenerator contains many factory functions for building key game aspects.
    GenericRestorationItem
    generic ConsumableItem subclass that can increase a CrewMember's fullness or health (or both).
    InvalidCrewMemberException
    unchecked exception to be thrown when an invalid crew member is used.
    Investor
    the CrewMember subclass Investor provides a starting bonus to a CrewState's funds and the CrewState's Ship's max shield level.
    Item
    base class for items in the game.
    ItemFindEvent
    ItemFindEvent gives a random item from the planet's loot table to the crew.
    MainWindow
    this class handles the displaying of the state of the game, and user input.
    Medic
    the CrewMember subclass Medic adds a PlagueCure item to a CrewState's inventory at the start of the game.
    MoneyFindEvent
    MoneyFindEvent gives a random amount of money to the crew.
    NullEvent
    NullEvent represents the GameEvent of nothing happening.
    Observable
    This class represents an observable object, or "data" in the model-view paradigm.
    Observer
    A class can implement the Observer interface when it wants to be informed of changes in observable objects.
    PiratesEvent
    PiratesEvent takes a targetItem from the Crew's Inventory if their inventory is empty the event does nothing.
    PlagueCure
    ConsumableItem subclass that has the effect of removing the PLAGUED effect from a CrewMember.
    Planet
    Planet class holds information about the planets in the game.
    Robot
    the CrewMember subclass Robot cannot have the CrewMemberEffects HUNGRY, TIRED, or PLAGUED.
    Scientist
    the CrewMember subclass Scientist causes the hasScientist() method of any CrewState it is stored in to return true.
    SetupWindow
    handles the gui user input for the game setup.
    Ship
    Ship class has a name, shield level and weapon.
    ShipPart
    Item subclass that represents the ShipParts that players must locate to win the game.
    ShipPartFindEvent
    ShipPartFindEvent adds the Planet ShipPart to the Crew's Inventory.
    ShipShieldUpgradeItem
    Item subclass that implements the ShipUpgrade interface.
    ShipUpgrade
    interface to be used by Items that affect a Ship object.
    ShipWeaponItem
    Item subclass that implements ShipUpgrade and acts as a weapon that can be attached to a Ship object.
    Shop
    Shop is a shop that players can buy and sell items to.
    ShopWindow  
    SpacePlagueEvent
    SpacePlagueEvent gives a random crew member the PLAGUED effect and a random amount of damage.
    Student
    the CrewMember subclass Student has 3 max action points and 50 max health, fullness, and restedness.
    WeightedArrayList<T>
    Very simple wrapper for ArrayList that gives each item a chance weight which is used for random selection.
